metadata.title: CVE-2024-34509 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
dcmdata in DCMTK before 3.6.9 has a segmentation fault via an invalid DIMSEmessage.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-34509` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dcmtk - 3.6.2-3ubuntu0.1~esm2
libdcmtk12 - 3.6.2-3ubuntu0.1~esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: dcmtk package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.6.2-3ubuntu0.1~esm2').
